en.hero-title: Expert Migration Law Services in Australia
en.hero-subtitle: Helping you navigate visa applications, sponsorships, and Tribunal matters with confidence.
en.about-text: Campos Law Practice provides expert migration legal services to help individuals and families achieve residency in Australia.
en.service1: Visa Applications - Partner, Family, Skilled, and Business visas
en.service2: Tribunal Matters - Applicantions for review with the Administrative Reviews Tribunal
en.service3: Immigration Consultations - Expert advice on your migration pathway
en.faq-q1: How long does a visa application take?
en.faq-a1: Processing times vary depending on the visa type and individual circumstances.
en.faq-a2: Yes, we provide online and in-person consultations by appointment.
en.appointment-text: Schedule a video call appointment with our migration law expert: 30 minutes for $200 or 60 minutes for $380 (including GST).
en.appointment-text2: Please wait for the payment instructions, which will be sent by email prior to your appointment.
en.reviews-subtitle: What our clients say about us
en.review1-text: I met Gilmara during a very difficult time after a visa refusal. From the very beginning and throughout the entire process, she proved to be a highly dedicated professional, fully committed to delivering the best possible outcome for her client. She was able to reassure me and develop a strategy to overturn the immigration decision through an appeal at the ART. We won the appeal in a record time of approximately two months, and after another month the visa was approved in line with the strategy we had outlined. I am very grateful for the work she did, and I highly recommend her to anyone who needs the support of an excellent professional.

pt.hero-title: Serviços de Direito Imigratório na Austrália
pt.hero-subtitle: Ajudamos você em processos de visto, sponsor e causas em Tribunais com segurança e confiança.
pt.about-text: A Campos Law Practice oferece serviços jurídicos especializados em imigração para ajudar indivíduos e famílias a conquistarem a residência na Austrália.
pt.service1: Aplicações de Visto - União estável/Casamento, Família, Qualificação Profissional e Negócios
pt.service2: Recursos em Tribunais - Interposição de recursos no ART (Administrative Reviews Tribunal)
pt.service3: Consultorias de Imigração - Orientação especializada sobre seu processo imigratório
pt.faq-q1: Quanto tempo leva para processar um visto?
pt.faq-a1: O tempo de processamento varia conforme o tipo de visto e as circunstâncias individuais.
pt.faq-a2: Sim, oferecemos consultas online e presenciais mediante agendamento.
pt.appointment-text: Agende uma consulta por videochamada de 30 minutos por $200 ou 60 minutos por $380 (incl GST) com nossa especialista em direito de imigração.
pt.appointment-text2: Favor aguardar as instruções para pagamento que serão enviadas por email antes da data agendada.
pt.reviews-subtitle: O que nossos clientes dizem sobre nós
pt.review1-text: I met Gilmara during a very difficult time after a visa refusal. From the very beginning and throughout the entire process, she proved to be a highly dedicated professional, fully committed to delivering the best possible outcome for her client. She was able to reassure me and develop a strategy to overturn the immigration decision through an appeal at the ART. We won the appeal in a record time of approximately two months, and after another month the visa was approved in line with the strategy we had outlined. I am very grateful for the work she did, and I highly recommend her to anyone who needs the support of an excellent professional.
